data_types.data_mentioned_in_text: identifying information such as your name
data_types.purpose_mentioned_in_text: We collect your personal information in order to provide and continually improve our products and services.
We use your personal information to take and handle orders, deliver products and services, process payments

data_types.data_mentioned_in_text: identifying information such as your... phone numbers
data_types.purpose_mentioned_in_text: We use your personal information to communicate with you in relation to Amazon Services via different channels (e. g., by phone, email, chat).

TP_sharing.purpose_mentioned_in_text: We share customers personal information only as described below and with subsidiaries
For example, you can order products from third parties through our stores
TP_sharing.third_party_sharing_practice_mentioned_i: services, products, applications, or skills provided by third parties

TP_name.third_party_name_mentioned_in_text: with subsidiaries {removed hyperref}, Inc. controls that either are subject to this Privacy Notice or follow practices
We employ other companies and individuals to perform functions on our behalf.

your_rights.rights_mentioned_in_text: You can access your information, including your name, address, payment options

your_responsibilities.responsibilities_mentioned_in_text: It is important for you to protect against unauthorized access to your password and to your computers, devices, and applications.
